#!/bin/bash
# Vanilla tModloader Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
## install packages to get version and download links
apt update
apt install -y curl p7zip-full wget jq file


GITHUB_PACKAGE=Dradonhunter11/tModLoader64bit


## get release info and download links
LATEST_JSON=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/$GITHUB_PACKAGE/releases" | jq -c '.[]' | head -1)
RELEASES=$(curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/$GITHUB_PACKAGE/releases" | jq '.[]')

if [ -z "$VERSION" ] || [ "$VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
    echo -e "defaulting to latest release"
    DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $LATEST_JSON | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i Linux)
else
    VERSION_CHECK=$(echo $RELEASES | jq -r --arg VERSION "$VERSION" '. | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .tag_name')
    if [ "$VERSION" == "$VERSION_CHECK" ]; then
        if [[ "$VERSION" == v0* ]]; then
            echo -e "Attempt 1"
            DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $RELEASES | jq -r --arg VERSION "$VERSION" '. | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i Linux)
        else
            echo -e "Attempt 2"
            DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $RELEASES | jq -r --arg VERSION "$VERSION" '. | select(.tag_name==$VERSION) | .assets[].browser_download_url' | grep -i tModLoader | grep -v -i vulkan | grep -v -i Windows)
        fi
        
    else         
    echo -e "Incorrect version, downloading the latest one."
    DOWNLOAD_LINK=$(echo $LATEST_JSON | jq .assets | jq -r .[].browser_download_url | grep -i Linux)
    fi
fi



## mkdir and cd to /mnt/server/
mkdir -p /mnt/server

cd /mnt/server

## download release

if [ "-e -i tMod*.exe" ] 
then
    echo -e "Removing old files"
    rm -rf *
else
    echo -e "Skipping file removal, first installation"
fi


echo -e "Running 'curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}'" 
curl -sSL ${DOWNLOAD_LINK} -o ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}

    echo -e "Decompressing files"
    7z x ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}

echo -e "Cleaning up useless files..."
rm -rf ${DOWNLOAD_LINK##*/}
cd /mnt/server
mv tModLoader64bitServer/ files/
cd files/
mv * /mnt/server
rm -rf files/
echo -e "Complete installation"
